title: Gaza ceasefire talks live: Trump says Israel and Hamas have signed off on ‘first phase’ of peace plan
summary: Former President Trump stated that "all parties will be treated fairly," while Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu expressed optimism that, "with God’s help," all hostages will be returned home. The comments come amid ongoing tensions and negotiations regarding hostages. Both leaders are addressing the delicate situation in the region.

title: White House gives platform to conservative influencers to air grievances during ‘antifa roundtable’ – live
summary: Witnesses at the White House reported being assaulted by left-wing protesters. However, they did not mention that they frequently engage confrontationally with individuals, filming the reactions they provoke. This omission led to a one-sided portrayal of the incidents.

title: University of Melbourne rated best in Australia in global rankings report
summary: Times Higher Education has ranked an Australian university as the 37th best in the world. Additionally, five other Australian institutions also made it into the top 100 rankings. This reflects a strong performance of Australian universities on the global stage.

title: Wayne Thiebaud review – staggering still lifes to make your mouth water
summary: A pop pioneer is showcasing a series of paintings featuring sweets and cakes, embodying a nostalgic vision of the American dream. The artwork captures the essence of indulgence and temptation. This vibrant collection invites viewers to indulge in a flavorful and whimsical experience.
